attributes.action: Shut Down All Construction Sites and non essential businesses due to COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details:
Construction job sites are currently still obligated to stay open. On an average job site hundreds workers are present. If one person on site contracts the COVID-19, the whole site will be exposed and contaminated as well as their families. These workers often share portable washrooms and toilets that are not cleaned throughout the day.
They are facing deaths if hurt doing their jobs as beds in hospitals are running low on numbers due to COVID-19 patients! Do something NOW!
attributes.background:
Shut Down All Construction Sites, Road Works and Roofing and non-essential businesses spreading COVID-19 to protect them and save lives of others ! 
The steps mentioned should keep COVID-19 contained and controlled. The action needs to be taken NOW not later.
